languages.text: {n}Молодой, вихрастый воин все еще бледен, но при вашем приближении он дисциплинированно сует пистолет в кобуру. На его губах появляется немного испуганная, но искренняя улыбка.{/n} "Вот это спасибо, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Вы вовремя поспели, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Уж не знаю, к чему меня эти бормотуны склонить хотели, но явно к чему-то недоброму".

{n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой, вихрастый воин все еще бледен, но при вашем приближении он дисциплинированно сует пистолет в кобуру. На его губах появляется немного испуганная, но искренняя улыбка.{/n} "Вот это спасибо, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Вы вовремя поспели, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Уж не знаю, к чему меня эти бормотуны склонить хотели, но явно к чему-то недоброму".

He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what these babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

languages.text: {n}Der junge Soldat mit den zotteligen Haaren ist noch immer blass. Als du dich aber näherst, steckt er seine Pistole weg – ein Zeichen guter Disziplin. Er lächelt dich etwas verängstigt, aber aufrichtig an.{/n} "Danke, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihr seid gerade rechtzeitig gekommen. Ich weiß nicht, was diese wirren Freaks von mir wollten, aber es war sicher nichts Gutes."
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Soldat mit den zotteligen Haare nist noch immer blass. Als du dich aber näherst, halftert er seine Pistole — ein Zeichen guter Diziplin. Er lächelt dich etwas verängstigt, aber aufrichtig an.{/n} "Danke, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihr seid gerade rechtzeitig gekommen. Ich weiß nicht, was diese wirren Freaks von mir wollten, aber es war sicher nichts Gutes."

languages.text: {n}Le jeune soldat hirsute est encore pâle. Pourtant, quand vous vous en approchez, il rengaine son pistolet, geste qui témoigne d'une bonne discipline. Il vous lance un regard quelque peu apeuré, mais son visage s'éclaire d'un vrai sourire.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie... Vous arrivez à point nommé ! J'ignore ce que ces babillards me voulaient, mais certainement pas du bien. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune soldat hirsute est encore pâle. Pourtant, quand vous vous en approchez, il rengaine son pistolet, geste qui témoigne d'une bonne discipline. Il vous lance un regard quelque peu apeuré, mais son visage s'éclaire d'un vrai sourire.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie... Vous arrivez à point nommé ! J'ignore ce que ces babillards me voulaient, mais certainement pas du bien. »

languages.text: {n}这个蓬头垢面的年轻士兵脸色苍白。当你靠近的时候，他把手枪收进了皮套——这是受过良好训练的标志。他对你露出了胆怯而又真诚的微笑。{/n}“谢谢您，大人，您来得正是时候。我不知道这群胡言乱语的家伙想找我干什么，但肯定不是什么好事。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个蓬头垢面的年轻士兵脸色苍白。当你靠近的时候，他把手枪收进了皮套——这是受过良好训练的标志。他对你露出了胆怯而又真诚的微笑。{/n}“谢谢您，大人，您来得正是时候。我不知道这群胡言乱语的家伙想找我干什么，但肯定不是什么好事。”

languages.text: {n}ボサボサ頭の若年兵は、まだ顔色が悪い。それでも、あなたが近づくと自分の拳銃をホルスターに納める…よい規律の模範だ。兵士はいくぶん恐れつつも、心からの笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}「ありがとうございます、陛下。いいタイミングでのご到着でしたね。こんな風に僕とおしゃべりして何をお求めかはわかりませんが、どう考えても役に立つ話なんてできませんよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

traits.locale_text: {n}毛深い若年兵は、まだ顔色が悪い。それでも、あなたが近づくと自分の拳銃をホルスターに納める…よい規律の模範だ。兵士はいくぶん恐れつつも、心からの笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}「ありがとうございます、閣下。いいタイミングでのご到着でしたね。こんな風に僕とおしゃべりして何をお求めかはわかりませんが、どう考えても役に立つ話なんてできませんよ」

languages.text: {n}El joven y melenudo soldado sigue pálido. Sin embargo, cuando te acercas, enfunda su pistola, signo de la buena disciplina. Te dedica una sonrisa algo asustada pero genuina.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha llegado justo a tiempo. No sé qué querían de mí esos asquerosos charlatanes, pero desde luego no era nada bueno».
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven y melenudo soldado sigue pálido. Sin embargo, cuando te acercas, enfunda su pistola, signo de la buena disciplina. Te dedica una sonrisa algo asustada pero genuina.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha llegado justo a tiempo. No sé qué querían de mí esos asquerosos charlatanes, pero desde luego no era nada bueno».

languages.text: {n}Dağınık saçlı genç asker hâlâ solgun olsa da sen yaklaşırken sıkı disiplininin alametifarikası olarak tabancasını kılıfına koyuyor. Biraz ürkek ama hakiki bir gülümseme bahşediyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {mf|lordum|leydim}. Tam vaktinde yetiştiniz. Abuk subuk konuşan o ucubeler benden ne istiyordu bilmiyorum ama belli ki hayra alamet değildi."
languages.original_text: {n}The young, shaggy-haired soldier is still pale; nonetheless, as you approach, he holsters his pistol — the hallmark of good discipline. He gives you a somewhat frightened but genuine smile.{/n} "Thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}. You arrived in the nick of time. I don't know what those babbling creeps wanted with me, but it definitely wasn't anything good."
